@NERDS, I see, so that's why. I do live in asia and I did notice a difference when it comes to smell. People who look more(European?) tend to have the Guava(the fruit) scent when they're really sweaty. People who look more of Asian(Chinese etc) descent at the worst case would have a faint to strong sour smell. Those who are more African(I rarely encounter them) tend to smell like a stronger and rather fermented scent of Pomelo(fruit again). Arabian looking ones I can't really remember. In PE class it is really inevitable that I would detect the scent. I don't have the kink. I think... Also people this isn't NTR. I do see a massive CUCK but he didn't exactly get cucked... ALSO! We know it's hard to detect your own scent but still.. Take good care of your bodies people!! BECAUSE WE WILL PURGE THE UNCLEAN!!!

After a promising set-up, this quickly turns into a repulsive, boner-killing downer. Karin's loneliness & sorrow make her an immediately endearing character, and it's easy to empathize with her awful situation. She's also quite sexy, and this is hentai, so of course I wanted to see her get down & dirty. But I absolutely did NOT want to see a bullied little girl get manipulated and further abused by some heartless shithead. The sadistic ugliness of the story is no fun, and it robs the (excellent) art of any sex appeal it might otherwise possess.
Outcome could be worse, I guess, but finding somenone who cannot smell anything would probably have been more wholesome.

This should have defloration tag. Yes, I reconfirmed @SeedySkies69 's statement that most eastern asian have light BO but it's not only from DNA, it's also from diets. If you eat a lot of Indian food or garlic it's gonna amp up your BO. The majority of people do despise something uncommon because they have mobs mentality. I do think the second part of this manga, the dirty route is kinda disgusting though. But this manga sure has beautiful arts, so just ignore the story and focus on the girl should be the best here.

The interesting cultural trivia here is there's a disparity in views surrounding body odor between the East and West. A minor gene that leads to less/no body odor is very common among Eastern Asians, whereas iirc, the % of European-descent with it is only 2%? It's called ABCC11 according to a quick google to refresh my memory (Do your own research if interested or unsure!) The body odor isn't actually any different from those with BO in the west! lol -- you can hook up with just about any Caucasian and get this level of BO. It's just seen as shocking and frowned upon more by Asians, to the extent that they'll suggest surgery. Deodorant is significantly less available in some places too despite high population density in some areas, which sucks for those who don't know they're normal by Western standards.
